field.label: Request Type
field.description: Note: Stablishment only for XB posts.

field.label: Request to Circulate
field.description: JO = Job Opening \n TJO = Temporary Job Opening

field.label: Job Code
field.warning: Please select the Job Code that best fits the job description or generic job profile that you are using for this position. Please remember that the Job Code you select, will affect the associated rosters which will only be pulled from the same Job Family/Grade, and it will also affect the Functional Job Title which will eventually be assigned to the selected candidate in their Letter of Appointment and in the Staff List

field.label: Reason for the stablishment and/or circulation
Job Description (JD)
field.description: If JD does not exist, please describe briefly the functions of the post on a Word document, for association to a Generic Job Profile, or fill in a full JD form. JD forms can be obtained by clicking on 'More info' above.

field.label: Latest Division Organizational Chart
field.description: Please see sample chart by clicking on 'More info' above.

field.label: Expected strategic outputs and correlation with the programme of work and regular budget posts
The functions of above post are aligned with the agreed strategic direction of ASDD or with the original project objective

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Post Clearance Request : For your review field(Reference)
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
Dear field(SectionUnitChief)
Please review/approve the following clearance request: IMIS Post Number : field(PostIMISNumber) Grade : field(CategoryGrade) Division : field(DivisionName)
Date : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards, User()

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Post Clearance Request : For revision field(Reference)
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
Dear Requrestor(),
The following request has been sent back to you for revision.
Comments : Comments()
IMIS Post Number : field(PostIMISNumber) Grade : field(CategoryGrade)
Date : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards,
User()

emailNotificationTemplate.subject: Post Clearance Request : Sent back for Clarification (field(Reference))
emailNotificationTemplate.body:
Please note that the following clearance request has been sent back to for clarification:
Comments : Comments()
IMIS Post Number : field(PostIMISNumber) Grade : field(CategoryGrade)
Date : DateTime() Link : Link()
Regards, User()
